faq.title: Frequently Asked
faq.a1: FunTell is a content experience platform that turns any information into an interactive, multilingual experience with built-in AI assistants. Build via dashboard or import a document for automatic AI setup. Share via links, QR codes, or embeds — no app required.
faq.a2:
1) Create your project via dashboard, or import a document and let AI generate everything automatically
2) Share via link, QR code, or embed on any surface
3) Visitors access AI-powered, multilingual content instantly — no app needed
faq.q3: Do visitors need to download an app?
faq.a3: No. FunTell works through any smartphone browser. Simply scan the QR code—nothing to download or install.
faq.a4: Content and AI conversations are available in 10+ languages: English, Mandarin, Cantonese, Japanese, Korean, Thai, Arabic, Spanish, French, Russian, and more.
faq.a5: Four tiers: Free ({freeProjects} projects, {freeSessions} sessions/month), Starter ({starterBudget}/month, {starterAiSessions} AI sessions, max 2 languages), Premium ({monthlyBudget}/month, {aiSessions} AI sessions, unlimited languages, white label), Enterprise (lowest per-session rate, 100 projects, custom domain). All paid plans include auto top-up, AI voice, dashboard, QR codes, and hosting.
faq.q6: How quickly can we get started?
faq.a6: Projects can launch within minutes. Use our dashboard to set up your project manually, or import a document via an AI tool like Claude Code and have everything generated automatically — content, categories, AI assistant, and QR codes.
faq.q7: Can we customize the content and AI?
faq.a7: Yes. Full customization using our self-service dashboard. Manage content, configure AI assistant behavior, set welcome messages, and update anytime.
faq.q8: How quickly are QR experiences available?
faq.a8: QR experiences are available instantly after creation. Create your project, add content, and share your QR code right away.
faq.a9: Free: {freeSessions} sessions/month, no translations. Starter: {starterBudget} budget, AI {starterAiCost}/session ({starterAiSessions} included), max 2 languages. Premium: {monthlyBudget} budget, AI {aiCost}/session ({aiSessions} included), unlimited languages. Auto top-up available for paid plans.
faq.still_have_questions: Still have questions? Reach out via our Contact form.
